Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute near 31st/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses temp. rerouted EB: 35th, Rhodes, 33rd, Cottage Grove, & 35th Term.; WB: Exit via 35th Term., due to street blockage near 31st/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 31st/Cottage Grove, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 35th, Rhodes, 33rd, Cottage Grove, & into 35th Terminal.

Westbound buses will operate/Exit via 35th Terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute near Cottage Grove/65th
ShortDescription: 4 Cott Grv buses rrtd SB via Cott Grv, 63rd, Langley, Mrqtt & Cott Grv; NB via Cott Grv, Mrqtt, Evans, 63rd & Cott Grv due to police activity nr Cott Grv/65th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Cottage Grove/65th.

  • Southbound buses will operate via Cottage Grove, 63rd, Langley, Marquette and Cottage Grove.
  • Northbound buses will operate via Cottage Grove, Marquette, Evans, 63rd and Cottage Grove.

Allow extra travel time.
